moves.name: Aura Wheel
moves.effect: Raises the user's Dexterity by 1. The move's type is Electric if Morpeko is in Full Belly Mode, and Dark if in Hangry Mode.

moves.name: Bolt Strike
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Charge
moves.effect: The user's next Electric-type move deals double damage. The user's Insight is raised by 1.

moves.name: Charge Beam
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the user's Special is raised by 1.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special by 2.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.effect: Creates an Electric Terrain for 5 rounds. Pokémon on the ground cannot fall Asleep, and the power of Electric-type moves is boosted.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.effect: The target's next move becomes Electric-type, regardless of its original type.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.effect: Damage increases the faster the user is than the target.

moves.name: Electroweb
moves.effect: Lowers the Dexterity of all opponents hit by 1.

moves.name: Ion Deluge
moves.effect: For the rest of the round, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.effect: The user levitates for 5 rounds, becoming immune to Ground-type moves.

moves.name: Nuzzle
moves.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Parabolic Charge
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt to all targets.

moves.name: Plasma Fists
moves.effect: For the rest of the round, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Spark
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.effect: High chance to miss. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed. Cannot miss in Rain.

moves.name: Thunder Cage
moves.effect: The target is trapped and takes damage for 1d4+1 rounds.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.effect: On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed or Flinches.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Volt Switch
moves.effect: After dealing damage, the user may immediately switch out with another Pokémon in the party.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to one-quarter of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.effect: Very high chance to miss. On a hit, the target is always Paralyzed.
